item.description: Join us to share how you are increasing your awareness and utilizing L.O.A. in your life. What changes are you making to create a life of joy and ease? Due to the size of the room, we are accepting yes or no responses only. If you respond yes and find you can no longer attend, please change your response in order to create space for someone else to join us. Please honor the 16 spots we have for the reserved room. Looking forward to seeing everyone. Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: We meet in the private room in the back.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: P.M. L.O.A. Meetup
